Package com.chrisgalhur.dice_game.security

package com.chrisgalhur.dice_game.security
Manages security for the application using JWT (JSON Web Tokens). It includes classes for configuring security, handling authentication, and generating JWT tokens.
  • The classes in this package are:
    • CustomAuthenticationManager: Responsible for the authentication process of users.
    • JWTAuthenticationFilter: Manages the JWT authentication process.
    • JWTAuthEntryPoint: Manages the authentication entry point of the API.
    • JWTGenerator: Generates the JWT token.
    • SecurityConfig: Configures the security settings.
    • SecurityConstants: Contains constants related to security.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.chrisgalhur.dice_game
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CustomAuthenticationManager
    CustomAuthenticationManager is responsible for authenticating users by username and password.
    JWTAuthenticationFilter
    Handles JWT-based authentication.
    JWTAuthEntryPoint
    Handles authentication entry point exception related to JWT authentication.
    JWTGenerator
    Handles JWT generation and validation.
    SecurityConfig
    Configuration class for Spring Security.
    SecurityConstants
    Stores security constants.
